description: OmniCorp's X12P fires "sunshots": heated hydrogen plasma pellets enveloped with polymers in a spread pattern. Instead of exploding, whenever these hit something solid, it is almost guaranteed to enter spontaneous combustion, starting a chain reaction that "bounces" through convection to anything too close, including a shooter stupid enough to fire this at point-blank. Powered by UPS.
//: This is safer to shoot than the other plasma guns and can incinerate tightly packed hordes better than most but the BOUNCE effect makes this very dangerous in CQB, specially indoors. Using both an incendiary AOE and INCENDIARY will really set everything moving or shambling in its path on fire.

description: A titanium:sapphire near-ultraviolet laser powered with a rechargeable hydrogen fuel cell fed by a solid hydrogen canister, the XNU is deadly invisible. While technically it is not a rifle because there is no rifling, pedants in OmniCorp R&D were speechless in awe of its firepower, drinking atomic coffee brewed using water byproduct from a freshly recharged cell and so the misnomer carried on.
//: It's not possible to make the laser both invisible and capable of passing through transparent barriers in-game without hardcoded changes
